user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (contact@vitalitypartners.com) with an update on OptiLife’s HealthHub requirements, and remind her she can review her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

Could you please email me (contact@vitalitypartners.com) an update on OptiLife’s current HealthHub requirements at your earliest convenience?  

Feel free to review your Gmail and Notion workspace for the most recent details before sending the update.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
Vitality Partners

final_output:
